Frequently Ask Questions

What is Lendr Network?

Lendr Network is a decentralized protocol creating synthetic real world asset (RWA) tokens through interest-free loans.

Lendr’s mission is to give everyone equal access to financial opportunities.

What is Lendr's use case?

Lendr Network has a variety of use cases:

  • Diversify on-chain portfolios and treasuries with synthetic:
    • Real estate, commodities, treasuries, indices, etc.
  • Access real world assets in existing DeFi protocols
    • Lending, staking, yield farming, etc.
  • Hedge against inflation
  • Earn lending revenue by staking in Lendr’s pools
  • Global access to real world asset classes
How are RWA tokens better than other RWA options?

  • Better than ETFs – Liquidity can be used in DeFi protocols (yield farming, lending, staking, etc.)

  • Better than Stablecoins/Cash – Inflation-proof, decentralized, added RWA returns
  • Better than Real World Assets – Highly liquid, globally accessible, scalable, no overhead, no ongoing interest costs
How is Lendr better than other RWA protocols?

  • Lendr’s unique synthetic tokenization method makes our protocol superior in the following ways: 

    • Higher Capital Efficiency
    • Global Accessibility
    • Instant Scalability
    • Diverse Asset Coverage 
    • Access to RWAs on-chain
    • Trustless Non-Custodial Solution
    • Unlocked Assets
How can I earn money with Lendr?

  • There are four ways to earn with Lendr:

    1. Deposit RWA Tokens – earn liquidation gains in collateral and RWA token rewards

    2. Stake LNDR – earn rewards from issuance fees and redemption fees

    3. Liquidate Troves – earn rewards and gas coverage 

    4. Stabilize Inflation Price – earn rewards by keeping the token peg through redemptions and issuance arbitrage. 

    Follow our Quick Start Guide to get started.

Does Lendr have any tokenomics fees?

The Lendr tokens have no fees, and ownership of the token contracts is renounced.

There are also no fees for staking/unstaking Lendr tokens in our protocol.

You can buy, sell, stake, and transfer your tokens freely.

There are only fees related to Lendr’s decentralized lending platform (issuance, redemption, etc.)

Launch Dapp
Quick Start Guide

"We conservatively estimate that the total market will significantly exceed USD 10 trillion by 2030."

Roland Berger Unlocking a New Era of Ownership, Trading, and Investment

$4 trillion in value by 2030."

"Tokenization of real-world assets (RWAs) is the fuel that’s needed to propel crypto into the mainstream."

Chainlink Scaling DeFi to a Global Level

"The on-chain Real World Asset (RWA) market is projected to reach $4 trillion to $16 trillion by 2030."

Boston Consulting Group

"The next generation for markets, the next generation for securities, will be tokenization of securities.”

Larry Fink Blackrock CEO

"Trillion Dollar Crypto Opportunity: Real World Asset Tokenization"

Coindesk

"Tokenizing real-world assets allows DeFi to tap into some of the largest financial markets."

Forbes

"Flatcoins are the next evolution of stablecoins."​ (Inflation-Proof Stablecoins)

Coinbase Brian Armstrong - CEO of Coinbase

"Off-chain assets are going to be increasingly important in DeFi, the growth potential is quite considerable."

Binance
